description: Header file defining the RemotePlugin class, which is part of the WPEFramework plugin system. It declares the RemotePlugin class with methods related to plugin lifecycle, communication, and integration with Rust and Thunder framework components.

classes.name: RemotePlugin
classes.description: Represents a remote plugin that interfaces with Rust, Thunder, and WebSocket components within the plugin framework.

methods.name: RemotePlugin
methods.description: Constructor initializing the RemotePlugin with configuration.

methods.name: ~RemotePlugin
methods.description: Default destructor.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the provided shell.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns information about the plugin.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increases the reference count for the plugin.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decreases the reference count and potentially deletes the plugin.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the plugin (conditional compilation based on Thunder version).

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the plugin (conditional compilation based on Thunder version).

methods.name: Attach
methods.description: Attaches a communication channel.

methods.name: Detach
methods.description: Detaches a communication channel.

methods.name: Close
methods.description: Closes a channel (conditional on Thunder version).

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes a callback (conditional on Thunder version).

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates a token and method with parameters (conditional on Thunder version).

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Invokes a JSON RPC method or handles callbacks, with overloads based on compile conditionals.

methods.name: Inbound
methods.description: Handles inbound messages or elements.

methods.name: onRead
methods.description: Handles reading responses from the remote process.

methods.name: LaunchRemoteProcess
methods.description: Starts a remote Rust process with shared libraries, host IP, and port.

methods.name: SendTo
methods.description: Sends JSON messages to a specific channel.

methods.name: WPEFramework::PluginHost::ILocalDispatcher * Local()
methods.description: unavailable
